title: Nancy
name: Parc de la Pépinière
content: A 50 acre square park in the heart of the city. It was once used as a garden to grow trees for other parks/green areas in Nancy and the region. Now it is a pleasant and relaxing setting. There is a small zoo, a couple of bars and a children's puppet theatre. The open-air ''Auditorum'' hosts free concerts during summer evenings. Main entrances are located ''place Stanislas'' and ''place de la Carrière''.
